song_lyrics: Ese santso Horī khelīye khelīyeri Prabhu-pad hovat prīt.
Jīnake kām, krodh, mad, matsar, lobh, moh bhaye nāsh;
Kamal nayan Harikṛuṣhṇake padarat or tajī hai sab āsh… 1
Aṣhṭa bhāti vinatā sang tyāgī tehi vidh dhanko tyāg;
Shrī Ghanshāmke charaṇ upāsak, tinso adhik anurāg... 2
Madirā mānsako sab tyāgat, sab triy jānat māt;
Aṣhṭa-siddhi nav-nidhi na chāhat, premase Hari gun gāt... 3
Dharma-dhurandhar sant vivekī, jānat sār asār;
Harigun kahat sunat nish-vāsar tyāge he sabahī vikār... 4
Vairāg, bhaktike gnān bhājan, gun par rahat svachchhand;
Muktānand kahe so munivar sang miṭat he sab bhav-fand... 5
title: Ese Santso Horī khelīye khelīyeri

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1281: Sadguru Muktanand Swami

Category: Utsavna Pad
